text: Amphisbaena persephone is a species of worm lizard found in Brazil. ==References== persephone Category:Reptiles described in 2014 Category:Taxa named by Pedro H. Pinna Category:Taxa named by Andre F. Mendonca Category:Taxa named by Adriana Bocchiglieri Category:Taxa named by Daniel Fernandes da Silva Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles of Brazil
title: Amphisbaena persephone
